title: The Hunters
creator_credit: John Marshall and Film Study Center of the Peabody museum of Harvard University
brief_description: A study of the life and culture of four indigenous African bushmen as they hunt a giraffe and other game in the Kalahari Desert. Shows the difficulties of survival in a desert region and the skills displayed by the bushmen. Suitable for secondary level.
creator_credit_for_label: John Marshall and Film Study Center of the Peabody museum of Harvard University
